title: Google\Cloud\Batch\V1\AllocationPolicy\InstancePolicyOrTemplate
name: InstancePolicyOrTemplate
description:
Either an InstancePolicy or an instance template.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.batch.v1.AllocationPolicy.InstancePolicyOrTemplate

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.instance_template
params.description: Name of an instance template used to create VMs. Named the field as 'instance_template' instead of 'template' to avoid c++ keyword conflict.

params.name: data.install_gpu_drivers
params.description: Set this field true if users want Batch to help fetch drivers from a third party location and install them for GPUs specified in policy.accelerators or instance_template on their behalf. Default is false.
